Detailed Description

This class represents a solution (array of routes) of a VRP instance.

Authors:
Angel A. Juan, Miquel Gilibert, Marcos Fernandez

int srgcwscs.Solution.compareTo ( Solution  otherSol  ) 

Compare the solution with a given solution according to the costs.

Remarks:
returns -1 if the given solution is better than the current, 1 if the current is best and 0 if equal costs
Parameters:
otherSolution - Solution instance for the given solution to compare
Returns:
int - comparison evaluation (1 current best, -1 given best, 0 equal)
